did.unittitle:
Cassette Tapes of George P. Garrett,
1980-1981
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 5 audio cassettes.

See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Cassette Tapes of George P. Garrett, Accession #7654-d, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased on 1987 December 2.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Collection includes a recording of a performance, 1980 July 8, of Garrett's readers' theatre play, "Enchanted Ground"; a recording of Garrett reading from "Stonecoast"; and two recordings made at American University and Bennington College of Garrett reading from his work-in-progress, "The Succession: A Novel of Elizabeth and James." Henry Taylor introduces Garrett on the American University tape.

did.unittitle: Audio Recording of a performance of Garrett's play "Enchanted Ground: A Play for Readers' Theater," as performed in York, Maine, July 8, 1980
Audio Recording of Garrett at American University, reading from "The Succession." Introduced by Henry Taylor, September 16, 1981
Audio Recording of Garrett at Bennington College reading from "The Succession." n.d.
Audio Recording of Garrett at Stonecoast reading from "The Succession." n.d.
